title: Williams: 25 years of pain
summary: It had seemed just a temporary setback for Williams when its engine partner Renault withdrew from F1 at the end of 1997. Yes, it meant a couple of seasons asâ€¦

qa_pairs.question: What year did Renault officially withdraw from Formula 1 as an engine partner for Williams?
Which team partnered with Williams for engines prior to their withdrawal in 1997?
What impact did Renault's withdrawal have on Williams' performance in the following seasons?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It led to a couple of seasons of struggle.
wrong_options: A successful transition to another engine supplier
